content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area at position(x=0-6, y=-2.5 to 2.5)
A complete iron plate production line consisting of:
- 4 input chests at positions (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- 4 input inserters at positions (0.5, -1.5), (2.5, -1.5), (4.5, -1.5), (6.5, -1.5)
- 4 stone furnaces at positions (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- 4 output inserters at positions (0.5, 1.5), (2.5, 1.5), (4.5, 1.5), (6.5, 1.5)
- 4 output chests at positions (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)

### Iron Mining Area at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
An iron ore mining setup consisting of:
- 3 burner mining drills at positions (-10.0, -59.0), (-8.0, -59.0), (-6.0, -59.0)
- 3 output chests at positions (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5)

### Copper Processing Area at position(x=-28 to -20, y=-61 to -55.5)
A copper plate production line consisting of:
- 1 burner mining drill at position (-28.0, -61.0)
- 1 input inserter at position (-28.5, -58.5)
- 3 stone furnaces at positions (-27.0, -59.0), (-23.0, -58.0), (-21.0, -58.0)
- 2 input inserters at positions (-22.5, -59.5), (-20.5, -59.5)
- 1 output inserter at position (-25.5, -58.5)
- 2 storage chests at positions (-24.5, -58.5), (-22.5, -55.5)
- 1 output inserter at position (-22.5, -56.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check if you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities
- Ensure you have collected/crafted the necessary items before using them

### Errors when trying to connect entities directly
- Cannot connect storage chests directly to other entities using belts
- Use inserters as intermediaries between chests and belts/other entities
